meanings.definition: A type of extinct marine mollusk.
meanings.sent1: Scientists discovered ancient rudistids in the ocean.
meanings.sent2: The rudistids lived in the sea millions of years ago.
meanings.sent3: The rudistids threw a party under the sea!
meanings.sent4: The rudistids were like underwater time travelers.
meanings.sent5: The rudistids swam gracefully in the ancient waters.

meanings.sent1: The museum displayed a collection of fossilized rudistids.
meanings.sent2: Paleontologists study the fossilized rudistids to learn about the past.
meanings.sent3: The fossilized rudistids made the archaeologists gasp in amazement.
meanings.sent4: The layers of rock held the secrets of the ancient rudistids.
meanings.sent5: The fossilized rudistids whispered stories of bygone eras.

meanings.sent1: Researchers dedicated their lives to the study of rudistids.
meanings.sent2: The university offered a course on the study of rudistids.
meanings.sent3: Studying rudistids became the new scientific craze!
meanings.sent4: The study of rudistids unlocked mysteries of the past.
meanings.sent5: The intricate details of rudistids fascinated the scholars.
